FOUND IN: Sen(i)/ji - Japanese slang for "cent," as it literally means one-hundredth of an item (in this case, the currency unit yen).
Venus - The most widely recognized Roman goddess of love, equivalent to the Greek Aphrodite.
**The crossword curator of the local newspaper's Sunday edition** - His contribution to a community staple, illustrating civic engagement
Kahiko hula - traditional ancient hula dancing, symbolizing the island's connection with nature and its abundant rainfall

Life's purpose is aligned with personal ambitions
